Articles.Content:
Hi,

KSP freezes while playing. There does not seem to be a predictable pattern to when it happens. It has happened in the VAB, in space and during launch. The video simply freezes, but the audio continues. I am even able to pause the game with the esc key. However, after a few second the game automatically exits and dumps me back to the desktop. I am using stock KSP 1.9 newly installed on a fresh install of Windows 10 Pro. 

OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X Six-Core Processor  (12)
RAM: 16332
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (1944MB) Thsi is SLI
SM: 50 (Direct3D 11.0 [level 11.0])

Here is a section of the crash dump that contains the error message:

Call Stack for Thread 6728:
0x00007FFA12F9CBC4 (ntdll) NtWaitForMultipleObjects
0x00007FFA10098037 (KERNELBASE) WaitForMultipleObjectsEx
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCEE23F)
0x00007FFA0DCEE23F (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCEDF1A)
0x00007FFA0DCEDF1A (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCEF3E9)
0x00007FFA0DCEF3E9 (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCED4FA)
0x00007FFA0DCED4FA (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCF1108)
0x00007FFA0DCF1108 (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
ERROR: SymGetSymFromAddr64, GetLastError: 'Attempt to access invalid address.' (Address: 00007FFA0DCEF028)
0x00007FFA0DCEF028 (CoreMessaging) (function-name not available)
0x00007FFA0DD27315 (CoreMessaging) MsgBlobCreateStack
0x00007FFA0DD2659B (CoreMessaging) MsgBlobCreateStack
0x00007FF9FE1A5FAE (inputhost) CreateHeatGripServiceClient
0x00007FF9FE1A5E09 (inputhost) CreateHeatGripServiceClient
0x00007FFA126B7BD4 (KERNEL32) BaseThreadInitThunk
0x00007FFA12F6CE51 (ntdll) RtlUserThreadStart

Any help would be great.
